title: Shasta Speedway Open Show Event
text:
Shasta Speedway Open Show Event Where 
5:00 p.m. Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 Categories 
Events, Outdoors | Recreation, Sports 3 Days of Stock Car Racing! Come see your favorite racers from all over the Western U.S. and Canada! Food, drinks, face-painting and more! Friday is Practice from 4 pm to 7 pm Saturday Gates open at 5 pm for qualifying and racing at 7 pm Sunday is Main event day gates open at Noon Main events start at 1 pm! 3 days of racing for one price! All Seats $15 or Daily price of $8 per seat! Get your tickets now to a great End of Year Event! Call Frank at 530-515-8282
